transcripts.text: Oh, thank you.  Have a chat.  I'm not here to waste your time.

That's right.  Where are you from?
I'm originally from California.
Oh, yeah?
Yeah, but I spent time up in Kentucky and I live nearby here now.  Really?  40 minutes south of here.
You grew up in California?
I grew up all over the place, military.  How about you?
Los Angeles.  Originally from Alabama.
You're originally from Alabama?
Yeah.  All right.
I went to high school in Macon.  Oh, yeah?  Yeah.  Amazing.  It's pretty close.

Nice.  All right.  Why are you here?  Five to seven minutes.  Five to seven minutes.  Yeah.  Got a time.
Well, I am participating in the Politicon debate today.
Nice.
This is the first time that I'm aware that they had it in another state.
Yeah.
But it's nice to be in Kentucky.  Cool.  I like it here.  Oh, in Tennessee.
Where are we?  We're in Tennessee.  I get confused all the time, trust me.  You drive on the highway, they look exactly the same.

And what I do, I have a non-profit organization called BOND.  The Brotherhood, Organization of a New Destiny.  We've been around for 29 years now.  Nice.  And we are rebuilding a family by rebuilding a man.  I also have a radio talk show.  Cool.  Yeah, jlptalk.com.
Please give me your card afterwards.  I'd like to get connected with that.  jlptalk.com.
You said your TV show, the fallenstate.tv.
Oh, make sure you're in the mic.  You said you're doing a debate.  What are you debating?  Or what's your position?

I am a conservative all the way.  At one time I was a Democrat.  When I was a beta male, I was a Democrat.  But God forgave me and I became me.  I ask God to forgive me because real men are conservative and not liberal Democrats.  All the beta males are Democrats.

When you don't have... I've heard this.  As you make more money... Republican, you become way less, you become more concerned with what's being done with your money, which makes you more conservative.

Well, when you're more independent, you do, you pay attention to your money.  You want to invest it.  well, you want less taxes and all that crap.  But I became conservative before I got any money at all.
Talk to me then.

Once I became a Christian, I looked at the platforms, because at the time I was a Democrat, right?  So I looked at the platform of the Democratic Party and the Republican Party, And I realized that the Democratic Party itself is evil.  And the people who represent the Democratic Party are evil people.  They support abortion.  They support homosexuality.  They're anti-military.  They're anti-God.  And so I could no longer identify with that.  And so I looked at the Republicans.
Is faith a big part of how you make decisions?  And how do you define it?
That's the only way I make decisions.
How do you define faith?  What's it mean to you?

Loving God with all your heart, soul, and might along with nothing else.  And we love him.  You can't help but have faith in him.  But most people don't have faith in God.  Even though they say they do, they don't.  And you can tell by their lifestyle.
So it's possible to say you have faith in God, but actually not have...
Absolutely.  Most Christians don't have it.  They know the Bible, they know about God, but they don't know Him.
How do you tell the difference between someone who has real faith and someone who has fake faith?

The way they live.  The love, they have perfect love for all people because in them, God's love, right?  And so they love all people.  They don't accept evil as good.  And they don't worry about what others think about them.
Can we only figure that out by just looking at them?  And can someone fake it?
No.
It's impossible to fake it.

It's impossible to fake it.  It's impossible to fake it.  Matter of fact, it's impossible to be a son or a daughter of God and still sin.  And so anyone that's telling you that they sin, they are not of God.  Satan is their daddy.
Satan is their daddy.
Yeah.  All in the name of Jesus.  Because you cannot sin if you believe in God.
What else is really good, along with faith?  What other systems are also good?
The order of God.
To come up with decisions on how politics should be made, or how to spend your money.
Oh, I see.  Well, when you believe in God, you can't help but do the right thing because he's guiding you.
What would he guide you to?
Everything he does is perfect.
If I had to make a list of things that I need to make good decisions in life, faith number one.  What's number two?  What's number three?
Everything.  The whole aspect of your life.  Where you go, what you do, how you carry yourself, how you invest your money.  If you want a wife, he would give you the right woman to marry.
So it's like faith or nothing else.  Right.
You either believe or you don't believe.
What happens if you don't believe?
Then you suffer.  Life is hell on earth.
Like what?

You have fear.  You have doubt.  You have anger.  You have worry.  You have anxiety.  You're not sure what to do in life.  You can't see the right way to go.  Anyone who has anger is of Satan.  Because anger is of their father the devil.  There is no anger in God.
So it's impossible to be angry and have faith at the same time?
It's impossible to be angry and love God.  If you have anger, you're not of God.
Realistically, as I'm thinking about that, that means very, very, very few people would love God.  Anger seems to be a natural human thing.

That's why he said you must be born again.  And the way you're born again, you have to overcome your mama and return to your father.  If you don't love your earthly father, it's impossible to love God.  It's impossible to know him.  Because what the mother has done, she's turned the children away from the father toward her.  And Satan is her daddy.  And so you become like what you're angry, who you hate, right?  You become just like them.  And that's why you see a lot of men who act like women.  Any man that has anger is a woman.
Is there any person that disagrees with you on this?
A whole lot.
Tell me something that they said that you're like, I see what you're saying.  I hear what you're coming from, but still what?

You hate women.  You hate black.  You hate this and that, but I don't care.  I know that you must be born again, and you got to overcome the mother.  That's why God said one day he's going to return the children to the fathers and the fathers to the children.
Hear me out.  For the people that disagree with you, I know what you would say to them, but what's something that they said to you?
Well, they call me Uncle Tom, sellout.  You hate blacks, you hate yourself, you hate your mom, you hate your daddy.  All kind of stuff.
Can I just ask one last question?
Absolutely.

Cool, cool.  If it turned out that, and I'm not saying it's the case, but if the Republican Party ever went away from faith, as we've talked about it today, would that make you say, okay, Republicans don't get it either?
Well, I'm already saying that because most Republicans do not believe in God.

Okay.  Okay, you have to be a Christian.

I get it.

A lot of them are not.
